title: Wrecked Rose
description: Max SuttonConfident, witty charmer. Out and proud.I never expected him to cross my mind.One kiss wrecked me for anyone else.And now he consumes all my thoughts.If people find out, my world explodes.He doesn’t want to hide us.And I want him … but I might have to choose her.Welcome back to Rosehaven Academy.This is a mature new adult high school series and contains situations that some readers might find offensive.This book is book 1 of a duet and ends on a CLIFFHANGER. Book 8, Fearless Rose, releases August 2021.
author: Leila James
